channel.title: Pwn-La-Chapelle on Pwn-la-Chapelle
channel.description: Recent content in Pwn-La-Chapelle on Pwn-la-Chapelle

item.title: Haix-la-Chapelle 2025
item.description: We are happy to announce that we will be hosting our first ever CTF, Haix-la-Chapelle 2025, on the 29th of November! It will be a Jeopardy style CTF and will start at 10 am Berlin time, lasting for 24 hours.

item.title: Intro Workshops 2025
item.description:
Are you interested in CTFs and Cybersecurity? Do you want to get started, but don’t know how?
We are thrilled to announce that we will be hosting five introductory workshops this semester!

item.title: Deutsche Hacking Meisterschaft 2024
item.description: From July 10th to July 12th, we had the chance to participate in the first edition of the Deutsche Hacking Meisterschaft (DHM) in Bonn. This is the joint finals of the Cyber Security Rumble and the Cyber Security Challenge Germany.
